patthana21.46:1.1_0: Naāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.46:2.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.46:3.1_1: (Purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe…
patthana21.46:4.1_0: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
